thread.title: NCAA men's basketball tournament tickets to go on sale Oct. 17
thread.title_full: NCAA men's basketball tournament tickets to go on sale Oct. 17

title: NCAA men's basketball tournament tickets to go on sale Oct. 17
text:
NCAA men's basketball tournament tickets to go on sale Oct. 17 IndyStar Report 10:51 p.m. EDT October 1, 2015 The Ed O'Bannon trial vs. the NCAA began its third week on Monday. (Photo: USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Tickets to the preliminary rounds of the 2016 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Championship go on sale at 10 a.m. local time Saturday, Oct. 17, in each host city. Fans wanting to purchase tickets to the First Four, first- and second-round games or regionals can do so at www.ncaa.com/MBBTickets . 
The 2016 tournament begins on March 15 and 16 with the First Four -- four first-round games in Dayton, Ohio. First- and second-round games will take place on March 17 and 19 in Denver; Des Moines, Iowa; Providence, Rhode Island and Raleigh, North Carolina. Brooklyn, Oklahoma City, St. Louis and Spokane, Washington will host first-and second-round action on March 18 and March 20. 
The South Regional will be played at Louisville, Kentucky and the West Regional will be played in Anaheim, California on March 24 and March 26. On March 25 and March 27, the East Regional will be played in Philadelphia and the Midwest Regional will take place in Chicago. 
The 2016 Men's Final Four will be co-hosted by the University of Houston, RIce University and Texas Southern University on April 2 and 4. Read or Share this story: http://indy.st/1FJtYRf TOP VIDEOS
